entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 1:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -33.6°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 13.
